scripts.postbuild: cd clients/typescript-fetch && npm i && npm run build
scripts.generate:typescript-fetch: TS_POST_PROCESS_FILE='./node_modules/.bin/prettier --write' npm run generate -- -g typescript-fetch -t templates/typescript-fetch -o clients/typescript-fetch --additional-properties=typescriptThreePlus=true,npmName=mailinabox-api,legacyDiscriminatorBehavior=true,enablePostProcessFile=true
